assessment_item.title: ತಿಲಕರು ಆರಂಭಿಸಿದ ಪತ್ರಿಕೆ ‘ಮರಾಠ’ವಾದರೆ, ಆನಿಬೆಸೆಂಟರು ಆರಂಭಿಸಿದೆ ಪತ್ರಿಕೆ
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ತಿಲಕರು ಆರಂಭಿಸಿದ ಪತ್ರಿಕೆ ‘ಮರಾಠ’ವಾದರೆ, ಆನಿಬೆಸೆಂಟರು ಆರಂಭಿಸಿದೆ ಪತ್ರಿಕೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ನ್ಯೂ ಇಂಡಿಯಾ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:7490"},{"text":"

ದಿ ಬೆಂಗಾಲ್ ಗೆಝೆಟ್ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:7491"},{"text":"

ಕೇಸರಿ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:7501"},{"text":"

ಸಂವಾದ ಕೌಮುದಿ
